discussion.content: B is correct.

The correct Microsoft 365 service to use in this scenario is B. Stream.

Microsoft Stream is a video service in Microsoft 365 that enables users to upload, share, and manage videos securely. It also provides automatic speech-to-text transcription of video content, which can be used for closed captions, video search, and accessibility purposes.

Yammer is a social networking service in Microsoft 365 that enables users to collaborate and share information across teams and departments. It does not have the capability to upload, store, or transcribe videos.

Flow (now known as Power Automate) is an automation service in Microsoft 365 that enables users to create workflows to automate tasks across different applications and services. While it may be possible to use Flow to automate certain aspects of video transcription or management, it is not a dedicated video service like Stream.
